attributes.action: reject the proposals of 'equality minister' Harriet Harman to legalise sexism and racism in the work place against indigenous white men.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sexism and racism have no place in civilised society and so called 'positive discrimination' for every other class of worker other than indigenous white men is blatant sexism and racism towards this group. The labour party has done much to fight against the tyranny of oppression and to now allow this step away from equality is nothing short of a betrayal of the people of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
